revision.comment: Fix error with ETH chip brand
revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=AT&T |model=VPN Gateway 8300 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Accelerated Concepts Inc |est_release_date=07/2014 |type=VPN Router |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=Molex (4-pin) |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6707 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G100TF100 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41J128M16JT-125 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, |expansion_minipcie_num=3 |expansion_usb_num=3 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, populated,, CON7 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, CON1 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211E |eth_chip3_brand=Realtek |eth_chip3_model=RTL8211E |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53118 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=8 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=2 |addl_chips=4-port USB 2.0 Controller;NEC;UPD720114;;1;,,, Field Programmable DSP Switcher;Marvell;88PG847B;;2;,,, 802.3af Compliant PSE Controller;Linear Technology;LTC4263;;2;,,, 100V, 30W Isolated Flyback Controller;Liinear Technology;LT3748;;1;,,, 100V, 6.6A N-Channel PowerTrench MOSFET;Fairchild;FDT86102LZ;;1;,,, 2A Single Channel Current-Limited Power Switch;Diodes Inc;AP2101;;3;,,, 2A DDR1/2/3/4 Bus Termination Regulator;MaxLinear;XRP2997;;1;,,, 600mA Low Dropout Regulator;Diodes Inc;AP7165;;2; |flags=PoE switch, SIM Card slot, SNMP, metal case, |oui_eth=00:27:04 }} {{TagLine|AT&T VPN Gateway 8300 }} ===See also=== *[[AT&T NetGate 8200]] ==Images== ----
